DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate performance Dynamic Locking Screws ( DLS ) use stabilize shaft component distal femur fracture comparison standard lock screw ( SLS ) . The hypothesis DLS lead well functional outcome ( WOMAC score ) due increase symmetrical callus formation few non-unions .
DOC.brief_title: Dynamic Locking Screws 5.0 vs. Standard Locking Screws Fracture Distal Femur Treated With Locked Plate Fixation
DOC.criteria: 21 year old Closed open distal femur fracture ( AO 33 A13 , 33 C13 ) include distal femur fracture total knee arthroplasty Ability walk independently prior injury Eligible treatment ORIF distal femur large fragment lock plate ( LISS , LCP ) Willing able comply postoperative protocol return followup . Ability understand content patient information / inform consent form participate clinical investigation Signed informed consent Additional ipsi contralateral lower extremity fracture Any kind implant ipsilateral proximal femur Preexisting malunion nonunion ipsilateral low extremity Segmental bone defect require bone graft More 4 week injury surgery Pathologic fracture due disease osteoporosis ( eg , tumor , metastasis ) Polytrauma Active malignancy Any medically manage severe systemic disease Recent history substance abuse ( ie , recreational drug , alcohol ) would preclude reliable assessment Pregnancy woman plan conceive within study period Prisoner Participation medical device medicinal product study within previous month could influence result present study
